name: Taedium Vitae
description:
"Tenderness to the other, poisoning the heart with longing. A sense of the shortness of a moment that is impossible to keep. A regret about something passed away and the realization of an irreparable loss.
...
When somebody loves to the point of oblivion, something always ends.
At the very peak of wild pleasure, a chilling sensation of eternal quietness suddenly arises. It is rightly said that every time in pleasure we die. And this fusion is so intense that it cannot pass without a trace". 
— Sex and Terror, Quignard.

Description arranged and translated by me from the book's Russian issue.
September 14th, 2021.
@qasbuiat
